convert <- function(adj){
  res <- ""
  if(adj < params$adj_p){
    res <- "."
  }
  if(adj < 0.05){
    res <- "*"
  }
  if(adj < 0.01){
    res <- "**"
  }
  if(adj < 0.001){
    res <- "***"
  }
  return(res)
}

coeff_and_p <- function(adj, coef){
  res <- rep(NA, length(adj))
  for(i in 1:length(res)){
    res[i] <- paste(coef[i], convert(adj[i]))
  }
  return(res)
} 


library(ggplot2)

colorlegend <- c("Severe T1" = "red", "Moderate T1" = "blue", "Severe T2" = "pink", "Moderate T2" = "light blue", "Control" = "light green")

d <- read.csv2(fs::path(params$dataSti,  paste0("antallPerClusterOgPat_k_", params$ks[1], "_seed", params$seed, params$ext_name, ".csv")))
colnames(d)[2:ncol(d)] <- paste0("seed_", params$seed, "_k_", params$ks[1], "_", colnames(d)[2:ncol(d)])

antallTot <- apply(d[,-1], 1, sum)

for(i in 2:length(params$ks)){
  temp <- read.csv2(fs::path(params$dataSti,  paste0("antallPerClusterOgPat_k_", params$ks[i], "_seed", params$seed, params$ext_name, ".csv")))
  temp <- temp[,-1]
  colnames(temp)[1:ncol(temp)] <- paste0("seed_", params$seed, "_k_", params$ks[i], "_", colnames(temp)[1:ncol(temp)])
  x <- apply(cor(d[2:ncol(d)], temp), 2, max)
  new_cluster <- colnames(temp)[x < 0.99]
  sjekk <- which(x > 0.99 & x < 0.99999)
  if(length(sjekk) > 1){
    for(ii in 1:length(sjekk)){
      x <- cor(d[,2:ncol(d)], temp[,sjekk[ii]])
      j <- which(x > 0.99 & x < 0.99999)
      for(jj in j){
        if(sum(temp[,sjekk[ii]])/sum(d[,jj + 1]) < 0.95){
          new_cluster <- c(new_cluster, names(sjekk[ii]))
        }
      }
    }
  }
  d <- cbind(d, temp[,new_cluster])
}
